import React, { useState } from "react"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import PropTypes from "prop-types"; import axios from "axios"; import AsideBar from "./common/AsideBar"; // import { Redirect } from "react-router-dom"; import Footer from "./common/Footer"; import Button from "react-bootstrap/Button"; import Form from "react-bootstrap/Form"; const AddProducts = ({ auth: { user } }) => { const [products_name, setproducts_name] = useState(""); const [products_short_desc, setproducts_short_desc] = useState(""); const [taq, settaq] = useState(""); const [maq, setmaq] = useState(""); const [products_img, setproducts_img] = useState(""); const [price, setprice] = useState(""); const [sp_price, setsp_price] = useState(""); const [products_sku, setproducts_sku] = useState(""); const [products_sku_status, setproducts_sku_status] = useState(""); const [products_big_desc, setproducts_big_desc] = useState(""); return (
  • Home

Add Products

Products Name {setproducts_name(event.target.value)}} placeholder="" /> Products Short Desc {setproducts_short_desc(event.target.value)}} placeholder="" /> Total Allowed Quantity {settaq(event.target.value)}} placeholder="" /> Minimum Order Quantity {setmaq(event.target.value)}} placeholder="" /> Product's Image {setproducts_img(event.target.files[0])}} name="products_img" placeholder="" /> Price {setprice(event.target.value)}} placeholder="" /> Special Price {setsp_price(event.target.value)}} placeholder="" /> Products Sku {setproducts_sku(event.target.value)}} placeholder="" /> Products's SKU Status {setproducts_short_desc(event.target.value)}} > Products Big Descriptions
